subject: Campaign Finance
Watergate Affair
Special Prosecutors (Independent Counsel)
lead_paragraph: Archibald Cox expressed “extreme interest” in a 1970s criminal investigation of George Steinbrenner for illegal campaign contributions, according to documents released Thursday.
snippet: Archibald Cox expressed “extreme interest” in a 1970s criminal investigation of George Steinbrenner for illegal campaign contributions, according to documents released Thursday.
